scripts.setup: yarn add -D prettier @types/react-router-dom @types/styled-components @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin@^2.29.0 @typescript-eslint/parser@^2.29.0 eslint@^6.8.0 eslint-config-prettier eslint-config-standard eslint-import-resolver-typescript eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y eslint-plugin-node eslint-plugin-prettier eslint-plugin-promise eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks eslint-plugin-standard
scripts.setup-npm: npm install --save-dev prettier @types/react-router-dom @types/styled-components @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin@^2.29.0 @typescript-eslint/parser@^2.29.0 eslint@^6.8.0 eslint-config-prettier eslint-config-standard eslint-import-resolver-typescript eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y eslint-plugin-node eslint-plugin-prettier eslint-plugin-promise eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks eslint-plugin-standard
